content.prompt: In the passage, the author makes which of the following assumptions about his audience?

choices.label: They are familiar with mainstream rhetoric about globalization.
They are concerned about the loss of cultural diversity.
They support taking collective action to address local problems.
They benefit from the process of global convergence.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
